Blaze Entertainment Goodboy Galaxy and Witch n Wiz

name: Goodboy Galaxy/Witch n' Wiz
summary: The Goodboy Galaxy/Witch n' Wiz dual cartridge for Evercade features two grand adventures to enjoy on your Evercade systems. In Goodboy Galaxy, you'll take to the stars as Maxwell the dog as you seek to repair his broken hyperdrive. And in Witch n' Wiz, you'll tackle devious puzzles on a quest to save your childhood friend from a magical fate!
